quantified.upload.success: §aSuccessfully uploaded your statistics to the Quantified server.
quantified.upload.failure.collection.nul: §cFailed to upload: Statistics collection resulted in no data.
quantified.upload.failure.noresponse: §cFailed to upload: No response received from the server.
quantified.upload.failure.exception: §cFailed to upload: An unexpected error occurred during upload.
quantified.upload.failure.collection: §cFailed to upload: An error occurred while collecting statistics.
